The aggregate amount of both recurring costs and income associated with normal operations (except for the portion of these expenses which can be clearly related to production and included in cost of sales, services or financing) and expense (income) from ancillary business-related activities. Includes selling, general and administrative expense, research, development and engineering expense, intellectual property and custom development income and interest and debt related expenses (except those related to the financing activities of the entity).
